title: Saudi Higher Education Blended Learning Design and Operation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and classroom teaching experience
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen the capability to design blended learning models reflecting Saudi higher education institutions' cultural and educational environments. Practical strategies operable in smartphone-based limited technological environments are required

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more blended learning design principles (online-offline integration, enhanced interaction)
Learners can develop a blended class operation plan utilizing smartphones in limited technological environments
Learners can develop blended learning assessment tools (including project-based) that promote student engagement

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
